author: Retro Game Corps
description:
The Miyoo Mini Flip is a clamshell version of the beloved Miyoo Mini -- same compact size, same processor, Onion OS as a software option, and a decent price point.  Let's talk about why it makes me want to party like it's 2022 (and fingers crossed the hinge will hold up this time).

Buy one here (official site): https://lomiyoo.com/products/miyoo-mini-flip

Also available for pre-order from these retailers:
GoGameGeek: https://tidd.ly/47zSox6
(use code RGC10 for 10% discount)
Keep Retro: https://tinyurl.com/syysethd

Onion OS guide: https://retrogamecorps.com/2022/05/15/miyoo-mini-v2-guide/
MinUI guide: https://retrogamecorps.com/2025/10/24/minui-starter-guide/

Other OS options:
Allium: https://github.com/goweiwen/Allium
sprigUI: https://github.com/spruceUI/sprigUI

This was a review unit sent to me by the manufacturer.  All opinions are my own, they did not see this review ahead of time, and no money was exchanged in any way.

Ways to support this channel:
RGC merch: https://store.r
title: Miyoo Mini Flip Review: STILL GOT IT
